shortdesc.ph: Quality layers of subscribed video streams.
Quality layers of subscribed video streams.

section.note: To customize the resolution and subscribe to layers kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer1 to kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer6, please contact technical support to enable the ABR feature.
If you need to customize the resolution of LAYER1 to LAYER6, please contact technical support to enable the ABR feature.

plentry.pd: (0): Highest quality layer. This layer has the highest resolution.
(1): (Default) Lowest quality layer. This layer has the lowest resolution.
(2): Quality layer 1. This layer has slightly lower resolution than kRteAbrSubscriptionHigh.
(3): Quality layer 2. This layer has lower resolution than kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer1.
(4): Quality layer 3. This layer has lower resolution than kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer2.
(5): Quality layer 4. This layer has lower resolution than kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer3.
(6): Quality layer 5. This layer has lower resolution than kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer4.
(7): Quality layer 6. This layer has lower resolution than kRteAbrSubscriptionLayer5.
(0): Highest quality video stream with highest resolution.
(1): (Default) Lowest quality video stream with lowest resolution.
(2): Video quality layer 1, resolution just below HIGH.
(3): Video quality layer 2, resolution lower than LAYER1.
(4): Video quality layer 3, resolution lower than LAYER2.
(5): Video quality layer 4, resolution lower than LAYER3.
(6): Video quality layer 5, resolution lower than LAYER4.
(7): Video quality layer 6, resolution lower than LAYER5.
